author: Lupin 7
subject: Small Bald Lupin
body:
> >     I don't know if this is the game, but there was
> > a game for the 8-bit NES system called McKids or
> > something...?

I own a Famicom but I've never heard of M.C. Kids; I am interested though, 
what is it about?

>In a more on-topic note: Sorry, but it seems I jumped
>ahead of myself in planning for my Thanksgiving Lupin
>manga to be completed by Thanksgiving. Instead, I'm
>working on some ideas for a Lupin III Christmas
>Special story. I will, however, post the original
>script for the Thanksgiving manga, along with some of
>the incomplete sketches. That is, if there's any interest....
>

Sounds interesting; I'm looking forward to it.

Someone had mentioned the Transformers; and since we're talking about the 
Famincom, one of the first games I bought for it was Transformers(it's ok). 
Also; does anyone remember the old school Transformers? I happen to know 
that they are rereleasing the toys in Japan soon, my brother saw an add for 
them.

Also, on a manga related note; did you all know there was a piece of Manga 
released that was authored by Monkey punch in which the main character is 
Lupin and Fujiko's Son? I kid you note(poor word choice). Heres the 
description my brother read off the comic he found the add in,
"Lupin Syozoy/Kozoy by Monkey Punch
The father is Lupin, the Mother is Fujiko -
Small Bald Lupin(Bald like priest); he finds a hidden
secret map, with out really knowing were he is going, he goes on a trip to 
search for his father. "
he wasn't sure about 'Syozoy' as he had to read it quickly. Maybe someone 
here knows?
